alert.note: Alert for Hunt; Kaufman; Rockwall (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 10 at 1:35PM CST until December 12 at 7:23AM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... South Fork Sabine River Near Quinlan affecting Rockwall, Hunt and Kaufman Counties. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...South Fork Sabine River Near Quinlan. * WHEN...From late tonight to Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Minor out of bank flooding will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:45 PM CST Saturday the stage was 5.9 feet. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight to a crest of 15.9 feet early Sunday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage sometime Sunday evening. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
